@markboulton @rem @Netlify Routing common 404s to appropriate pages is lovely with the Redirects API. If there is still a very high volume of 404 traffic, you could cheekily use Google to save bandwidth and recover some traffic: [[redirects]] from = "/*" to = "https://t.co/xm4iXHPp34" status = 404
